title: China to create world-class business environment
content:
Aerial photo taken on Aug. 5, 2020 shows the Chengdu International Railway Port in Chengdu, capital of southwest China's Sichuan Province. (Xinhua/Liu Kun)
BEIJING, March 5 (Xinhua) -- China will foster a world-class business environment during the 14th Five-Year-Plan (2021-2025) period, according to a government work report submitted Friday to the national legislature for deliberation.
